message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. What do you think?
Alice, $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product but my budget is only $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
